## Gallery Showcase

### Professional Grid Layouts
Perfect for portfolios, presentations, and social media.

```bash
python modular_collage_maker.py --folder vacation_photos --style grid
```
*Creates: Clean, organized layouts with perfect spacing*

## Instant Results

```bash
# Get started in 30 seconds
git clone https://github.com/nipunbatra/collage-maker.git
cd collage-maker && pip install -r requirements.txt

# Download sample images
python modular_collage_maker.py --download-samples

# Create your first masterpiece
python modular_collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style mandala
```
